Package it.polimi.it.view.GUI

Class GameViewController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.it.view.GUI.GameViewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GuiInterface, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GameViewController extends Object implements GuiInterface, javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller of GameTurn that manages the client's turn and all of its operation
